jobs.title: Technical Customer Support Specialist
jobs.description:
About NoblyPOS

Nobly POS (Point of Sale) was founded in 2013 in London and is currently used by hundreds of happy merchants in over 40 countries. Nobly is packed full of features that enable shop owners to get more than they ever thought possible from their point of sale system. From in-depth reporting to loyalty schemes, Nobly allows our merchants to gain powerful insights into their business.

You can set up your shop within minutes, without expensive onboarding and support contracts and start making transactions in no time at all. Our powerful integrations connect Nobly POS with payment solutions, accounting software and marketing tools. Nobly POS allows merchants to seamlessly accept card payments, take cash transactions and view their reports from any device at any time.

For more information, visit www.noblypos.com
 (https://workable.com/nr?l=http%3A%2F%2Fwww.noblypos.com)

The Opportunity

We are growing our technical customer support team for Nobly POS in order to continue to wow customers as they continue to use our POS software!

You are excited about delighting customers, solving problems and finding solutions. You are smart, resourceful and charismatic. You love the idea of being a link between our customers and our product team – helping shape the vision of how we continually improve the experience for our customers.

As a Technical Customer Support Specialist, you will help deliver a great customer experience via email, phone and live chat. You’ll cover everything from on-boarding calls to troubleshooting and advice customers using the Nobly POS.

You have a passion for driving resolution, spotting trends and providing an outstanding experience.

Requirements

Main Responsibilities:

* Act as the first point of contact for new and existing customers, you will WOW Nobly POS customers with great service
* Answer customer queries in a professional and timely manner through multiple channels (emails, phone and live-chat)
* Solve technical problems like:
** Networking setup issues customers may have (protocols, static IPs, DHCP, bandwidth, IP blocking, firewalls, etc)
** iPad settings and issues
** Printers (USB, Wireless, Lan, BT)

* Become a ‘power user’ on Nobly POS software and hardware, helping customers navigate through their technology portal
* Complete troubleshooting and escalate where necessary
* Carry out account onboarding and process new orders
* Handle customer complaints, provide appropriate solutions and alternatives within the time limits; follow up to ensure resolution
* Identify and assess customers’ needs to achieve satisfaction
* Work with the management team to stay updated on product knowledge and be informed of any changes in company policies
* The right person will be comfortable in an "all hands on deck" environment, who cares for each customer's business as if it were their own, and loves solving customer issues whilst thriving in a startup culture.
* Experience in a (SAAS) customer/technical support team is a plus


What are we looking for:

* Has a self-starter attitude, and is willing to take ownership and go over and beyond for our customers
* Dynamic problem solver – focused on getting to a solution with a sense of urgency
* Comfortable in a fast-paced, startup work environment
* Clear, effective written and verbal communication skills
* Able to learn quickly and adapt to changes
* Self-motivated
* Proficient in Google Drive, Slack and other common office software


Bonus Points:

* Prior experience within the POS or Payment industry
* Hospitality experience

Benefits

Why we love working at Nobly

We inspire each other. You’ll work with a solid team of high potential folks who are excited about this opportunity, you can feel that energy.

We’re open-minded. We’re committed to hiring people from a wide variety of backgrounds, not just because it’s the right thing to do, but because we can learn more from people who bring different perspectives.

We’re flexible. While we are extremely results driven, we understand people need flexibility, and we can accommodate that in terms of working arrangements.

We're not perfect. And we're not looking to be. It's sometimes chaotic and rowdy. Our environment has its own personality, with a mix of ambition, self-reflection, competition and a family spirit.

See your results every day. In an industry notorious for low customer satisfaction, our technology saves merchants time and enables them to delight their customers. We also offer them tools and insights to grow their business. You will get to see the product in action when you visit local independent restaurants, bars and coffee shops, which are significant to their communities and to the economy.

jobs.title: Business Development Representative
jobs.description:
Looking for a new challenge in 2019? Here at Nobly POS we are a SaaS vendor in the SME Hospitality space, due to significant success in the UK, North America, our recent growth plans mean that we are looking to add to the Melbourne based sales team. We’re looking for someone to identify & prospect leads, across predominantly Australia, but also New Zealand and across Asia.


Key responsibilities:

• Lead qualification, opportunity analysis, prospecting & cold calling

• Appointment setting - arranging pre-qualified meetings for the team of Business Development Managers

• Engaging with senior decision makers up to C level - high level strategic conversations (verbal and email formats)

• Participating in outbound campaigns in conjunction with marketing

• Researching, name gathering, qualifying decision makers and updating Salesforce CRM system

Requirements

• 1-2 years' experience in a previous telephone based sales / activity-driven business development role

• Excellent ability to comfortably sell and pitch to decision makers over the phone

• Outstanding communication skills with an excellent focus on client satisfaction

• Hunger to succeed and exceed set KPI's

• Ability to effectively articulate benefits of the company's software solutions

• Team player with a proven track record of working well in teams

• Aspirations to forge a successful sales career where your hard work and effort will be rewarded

Benefits

This role represents a fantastic opportunity to get in at the ground floor of a rapidly growing start-up. With a fantastic CBD location and a passionate and vibrant team, we are looking for an individual who is keen to go above-and-beyond to ensure success.

jobs.title: DevOps / Infrastructure
jobs.description:
About NoblyPOS:

Our vision is to provide independent food and beverage business owners and their teams with technology they love.

Nobly is a tablet POS and Management Software for small and medium merchants from the hospitality industry: restaurateurs, bar and coffee shop owners. Merchants rely on Nobly POS to manage inventory and employees, gather business insights with dozens of powerful reports, set up loyalty schemes, take credit card payments, integrate with third-party apps and more. We help hospitality businesses make informed decisions about their company by providing them with new and intelligent technology.

We are a fast-growing international team of ~70 with offices in London, Austin, Montevideo and Melbourne. Nobly has doubled in size over the past 12 months and is on track to continue on this solid growth trend.


The Opportunity:

We are looking for a seasoned DevOps / Infrastructure expert than can join a fast paced team and work on maintaining our infrastructure and server deployments whilst ensuring scalability and robustness.


You will be confident and you will add value independently whilst collaborating with the scrum team. You will use your experience to deliver quality solutions in record time!

You will add value from day one in the job.


Responsibilities:

● Create and maintain deployment pipelines for multiple environments

● Collaborate with Architecture and Engineering teams to plan, deploy, and maintain business solutions in a cloud environment

● Troubleshoot any emergency infrastructure incident to achieve optimal application performance and stability

● Communicate effectively with engineering, production and QA teams in coordinating systems engineering work

● Recommend alternative design and platform decisions

● Collaborate with technical leads to integrate an end-to-end design that's well documented

Requirements

Required Qualifications:

● BS/BA or MS degree in Computer Science, or related technical field or equivalent practical experience.

● Ability to thrive in a fast-paced, collaborative, agile environment.

● Proficient understanding of code versioning tools such as git.

● Working knowledge of the general mobile landscape, architectures, trends, and emerging technologies.

● Solid understanding of the full mobile development life cycle.

● 2+ years of Google Cloud Platform experience

● 2+ years of experience with configuration management tools

● Experience overseeing server environments to ensure appropriate redundancy and fallbacks in all server environments

● Experience with containerization technologies such as Kubernetes and/or Docker

● Experience with building CI/CD pipelines and build environments

● Experience in Node JS, Mongo DB

● An ability to work closely with a team to troubleshoot issues.

Benefits

Why we love working at Nobly:

We inspire each other. You’ll work with a solid team of high potential folks who are excited about this opportunity, you can feel that energy.

We’re open-minded. We’re committed to hiring people from a wide variety of backgrounds, not just because it’s the right thing to do, but because we can learn more from people who bring different perspectives.

We’re flexible. While we are extremely results driven, we understand people need flexibility, and we can accommodate that in terms of working arrangements.

We're not perfect. And we're not looking to be. It's sometimes chaotic and rowdy. Our environment has its own personality, with a mix of ambition, self-reflection, competition and a family spirit.

See your results every day. In an industry notorious for low customer satisfaction, our technology saves merchants time and enables them to delight their customers. We also offer them tools and insights to grow their business. You will get to see the product in action when you visit local independent restaurants, bars and coffee shops, which are significant to their communities and to the economy.

You will be confident and you will add value independently whilst collaborating with the scrum team. You will use your experience to deliver a high quality product.

Responsibilities:

-Build reusable code and libraries for future use.

-Integration of user-facing elements developed by front-end developers with server side logic.

-Design and implementation of low-latency, high-availability, and performant applications.

-Strong understanding of Javascript, its quirks, and workarounds.

-BS/BA or MS degree in Computer Science, or related technical field or equivalent practical experience.

-Ability to thrive in a fast-paced, collaborative, agile environment.

-Experience with REST services.

-Experience with Node.js and MongoDB.

-Understanding the nature of asynchronous programming.

-Understanding of fundamental design principles behind a scalable application.

-Proficient understanding of code versioning tools such as git.

-Experience with large-scale distributed systems

-Deep understanding of scalable backend architectures, and modern API design concepts

-Practical ability to adopt common software design patterns


Bonus Points:

-Experience with the GCLOUD platform

-Experience working in an Agile/Scrum environment

-Experience in frontend development, especially with ReactJS

Benefits


-Competitive remuneration
-Great offices with a tech team doing what they love- creating technology that makes impact
-International career opportunities
-Fast-paced environment that enables fast learning and professional growth
-We play football every week ...twice
-Socials
-English tuition

jobs.title: Web Designer
jobs.description:
About Nobly

Our vision is to provide independent food and beverage business owners and their teams with technology they love.

Merchants rely on Nobly POS to manage inventory and employees, gather business insights with dozens of powerful reports, set up loyalty schemes, take credit card payments, integrate with third-party apps and more.

We are a fast-growing international team of ~70 with offices in London, Austin, Montevideo and Melbourne. Nobly has doubled in size over the past 12 months and is on track to continue on this solid growth trend.


The Opportunity:

We are seeking a talented and motivated Web Designer to join our growth team in London. The team’s mission is to unlock and increase demand for our product in the European, American and Australian markets. Our working environment is highly collaborative and fast-paced. The team is small, meaning you have the chance to take ownership of your ideas from conception to execution.

The candidate will have a strong portfolio exhibiting a high level of skill in producing digital and print media. You’ll be happy working under time pressure to produce collateral that wows those who see it, and communicates our mission to provide independent food and beverage business owners and their teams with technology they love.


What you will do:

* Be responsible for the development of Nobly’s visual branding across print and digital collateral
* Take ownership of the website UX to make easy and enjoyable to navigate
* Create beautiful, engaging digital (front end web design, email template designs, advertisements) and print pieces according to brief
* Contribute ideas and work closely with other members of the growth team to develop briefs and execute new initiatives
* Manage multiple projects simultaneously and ensure deadlines are met

Requirements

About you:

* 2 years experience working in digital media
* Passion for all things design, digital and technology
* Proficiency in Illustrator, Photoshop and InDesign essential
* Proficiency in Sketch and Zeplin preferred
* Up to date with the latest trends in web design and technology

Benefits

* Competitive Salary & Bonus Structure
* International Career Opportunities
* A culture focused on growing and developing your potential
* Socials, we have fun too :)
